trans-unit.source: Wraps an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> whose execution is initialized by an event.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> cuja execução é inicializada por um evento.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] It is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> that is used to handle an event; typically it can be raised from the host or by the runtime in response to a delay timer expiring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]É um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>que é usada para manipular um evento; normalmente ele pode ser gerado do host ou pelo tempo de execução em resposta a um timer de atraso expirando.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: EventDrivenActivity is inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; therefore, it is a sequence that has the additional restriction that the first activity should be an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity é herdada do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; portanto, é uma sequência que tem a restrição adicional que a primeira atividade deve ser um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the EventDrivenActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O EventDrivenActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o EventDrivenActivity pode conter outras atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity, with some additional characteristics.
trans-unit.target: O EventDrivenActivity é semelhante de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>atividade, com algumas características adicionais.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: An EventDrivenActivity must have a parent that is either a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Uma EventDrivenActivity deve ter um pai que é uma <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The first child of an EventDrivenActivity activity must be an activity that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro filho de uma atividade de EventDrivenActivity deve ser uma atividade que herda de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: All subsequent children can be activities of any type.
trans-unit.target: Todos os filhos subsequentes podem ser atividades de qualquer tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> blocks and waits for the pending occurrence of some events, such as starting a timer or the arrival of a message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>bloqueia e aguarda a ocorrência pendente de alguns eventos, como iniciar um timer ou a chegada de uma mensagem.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> finishes running and then all subsequent activities are executed.
trans-unit.target: Quando o evento ocorre, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>termina em execução e, em seguida, todas as demais atividades são executadas.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contains an EventDrivenActivity, the EventDrivenActivity has some restrictions: - The EventDrivenActivity may contain one, and only one, activity of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>contém uma EventDrivenActivity o EventDrivenActivity tem algumas restrições:-o EventDrivenActivity pode conter uma e apenas uma atividade do tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> must be the first child activity.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>deve ser a primeira atividade filho.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> cannot be in the event handler for a child activity and cannot be a child to the EventDrivenActivity if the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is not the first child.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>não pode ser no evento manipulador de uma atividade filho e não pode ser um filho de EventDrivenActivity se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>não é o primeiro filho.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: - As long as the first activity is the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, the event handler can contain any activities.
trans-unit.target: -Desde que a primeira atividade é o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, o manipulador de eventos pode conter todas as atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: If an activity other than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is contained in EventDrivenActivity, that activity cannot have an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se uma atividade que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>está contido em EventDrivenActivity, que a atividade não pode ter um manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that supports event handling can be used inside the EventDrivenActivity but the activity cannot have event handlers attached to itself.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma atividade que dá suporte à manipulação de eventos pode ser usada dentro de EventDrivenActivity, mas a atividade não pode ter manipuladores de eventos anexados a mesmo.

trans-unit.source: Another example is that the EventDrivenActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, but the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> itself cannot contain any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: Outro exemplo é que o EventDrivenActivity pode conter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, mas o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>em si não pode conter nenhum <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>classes.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> classe usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-identified name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário identificado da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atividade de evento que orienta a alteração.

trans-unit.source: The event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de evento que orienta a alteração.
